privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Al Rumaih Cars, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our application.
privacy.section1_content: We may collect your name, email address, phone number, and other information you provide to us.
privacy.section2_content: We may use your information to communicate with you, personalize your experience, and provide offers.
privacy.section3_content: We may share your information with third-party service providers or as required by law.
privacy.section4_content: We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy.section5_content: You can opt out of some data collection and promotional emails.
privacy.section6_content: We may update this policy from time to time. Continued use of our services means you accept the changes.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to Al Rumaih Cars! These terms govern your use of our app and services. Please read them carefully.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.body: By accessing our services, you agree to abide by these terms. If not, you may not use the app.

section2.title: 2. Use of Services
section2.body: You agree to use the services lawfully and not for any illegal or unauthorized purposes.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.body: All content is property of Al Rumaih Cars and protected by copyright law.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.body: Al Rumaih Cars is not responsible for any damages arising from your use of our services.

section5.title: 5. Governing Law
section5.body: These terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

terms.contact: If you have questions, contact us at info@alrumaihcars.com
